title: Syndra is becoming Mordekaiser 2.0
body:
**I know that this should be posted in "Report a bug" but I'm posting this here so I can raise Riot's awareness about this BIG issue.**

So, since 7.10 Syndra has been bugged and nothing was done about it. Now, in 7.22, Syndra has even more bugs than before and a lot of them are GAMEBREAKING and seem to happen way too often.

1. **Stutter step bug:** after ulting, Syndra's model desyncs and she starts moving in a laggy way. This could cost you a death and it's extremely annoying for people who play with fixed camera. 
This bug has been out for TWELVE patches despite being already fixed in the past (it's not the first time this bug appears).
2. **Ghost spheres bug:** sometimes, Syndra's spheres become untargetable for her W and E; this happens almost exclusively after the bug number 1, the stutter step bug.  Basically, after Syndra uses her ultimate, the spheres thrown with her ult and/or created after casting her ultimate start moving randomly around Syndra and can't be controlled with her other spells. 
This could fuck a whole fight up. Let's pretend that you want to R someone and then E to have an AoE stun, well it could happen that NOT A SINGLE SPHERE gets knocked back because they're bugged. You lose a fight, and you could potentially lose a game too.
3. **W recasting bug:** our last "big bug" that happens kinda often after 7.22. After casting W on a minion, it gets released behind Syndra and her W goes on cooldown instantly. 
This is MASSIVE in laning phase because your W becomes unrealiable and could lose you a trade. Happens multiple times during a single game and my last game with Syndra was a W bug shitfest.

[Here you have a list of some bugs with proof/videos by Overlord Forte.](https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/bug-report/2Eu7e5LL-gameplay-syndra-sphere-breaking-and-model-stuttering-bugs-since-710)


Now, I understand that some bugs are hard to fix and take time and effort, but right now picking Syndra puts you at a disadvantage because a lot of things in her kit are bugged and unreliable. Despite all those bug reports, nothing has been done and Riot seems to avoid talking about it.

Please, fix at least some of those bugs. I'm tired of having games where sometimes my QE just doesn't work and fucks my kill up.

Mordekaiser 2.0? Syndra was the OG Mordekaiser. Syndra is one of the most historically buggy champions in the game. There were numerous times where pure bugginess completely removed her from the meta.
Azir is / was buggier.  He had a bug where he would steal the skin of another Azir when killing them lol.

Azir is notable in that his bugs became immediately apparent and were worked on ... pretty much from the get go. So, the severity of his issues were visible very early on.

For the first 1-2 years--years, not months or weeks--Syndra's stun had a 50% or higher chance of 'not working'. The sphere would pass through the target and apply no CC at all. On the skill that critically defines her ability to engage or protect herself. It still took around 6 months before the first serious fix was applied to it after multiple frontpage reddit threads, and several more were needed to make it serviceable.

It's still bugged today, but right now the current version causes her stun to fail when it's cast during her death animation (so she dies, and a sphere is in motion--this sphere does not stun, even though it should).

The stutter step bug mentioned above has existed as long as her champion has, despite multiple fixes toward it. etc.
Also these days the stun lands when it's not supposed to sometimes too
